K12D0445_H0417:18a-23: de dag de ltar rin po che //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-24: skyed pa po yi pha dang mas //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-25: ya ge med cing gong ba med //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-26: 'byung ba chad pa rnam par spangs //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-27: dus dang rtog pa rnams las grol //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-28: skye med zad med rmad du byung //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-29: 'dzin pa kun la zhen la sogs //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-30: spangs shing lhag ma med pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-31: mchog gi mchog ste zhi ba med //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-32: dngos po kun gyi dbus na gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-33: rnam rtog med cing rten pa med //
K12D0445_H0417:18a-34: kun gzhi rnam zhes gsungs pa //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-0: nyon mongs @18b can gyi yid kyis ni //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-1: bem po rnams kyis sad par byed //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-2: mchog tu gnyis med rnal 'byor gyis //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-3: thob pa'i go 'phang bla na med //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-4: gnyis med mchog tu gsal ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-5: rlung gi de nyid yang dag rten //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-6: yi ge ho:yis bskul nas ni //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-7: me yi 'khor lo sad par byed //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-8: de lta'i n'a da'i go 'phang don //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-9: bla ma'i zhal la yang dag gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-10: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-11: n'a da'i tshig rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o ////
K12D0445_H0417:18b-12: de nas gzhan yang gsang ba'i don //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-13: bla na med pa bshad kyi nyon //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-14: gsang ba bha ga zhes su gsungs //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-15: bha ga de bzhin chos 'byung ba //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-16: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang rten //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-17: dga' ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' yi ni gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-19: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid gsal; ;ye shes chen po spros pa med //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-20: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-21: bral dga'i mtha' ste mchog tu phra //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-22: lhan cig skyes dga' kun bdag gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-23: dga' bral la sogs skad cig gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-24: phra ba yang dag byang chub sems //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-25: srog la phan bar 'tsho ba ste //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-27: dus bral rnam rtog med pa ste //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-28: stong nyid skye med 'chi ba med //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-29: sprul pa'i 'khor lor thim pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-30: bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo skye //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-31: bsam gyis mi khyab zhi ba ste //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-32: chags bral 'gro kun skye ba med //
K12D0445_H0417:18b-33: rdo rje padma mnyam sbyor bas //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-2: rlung gi de nyid rig pa yis //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-3: rtsa ba'i dbus su 'dzin par byed //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-4: gang de skye ba nyams myong bar //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-5: gsang ba zhes ni bya bar grags //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-6: de nyid gsang ba yi ni mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:19a-7: bla ma'i zhal la lhag par gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-8: phan tshun brgyud pa'i rim pa yis //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-9: bla ma bzang po'i zhal nas shes //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-10: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las /
K12D0445_H0417:19a-11: gsang ba chen po'i tshogs ma lus par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0445_H0417:19a-12: de nas gzhan yang sdom pa'i don //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-13: de kho na nyid bshad kyi nyon //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-14: sdom pa srung bar byed pa gang //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-15: de ni byang chub sems zhes brjod //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-16: rdo rje'i rtse mor sems 'dzin pa //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-17: de ni srung pa zhes ni grags //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-18: dbang po rnams ni yul rnams la //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-19: 'jug cing rtag tu gang gnas pa //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-20: de ni sdom pa srung ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-21: dam tshig srung bar bshad pa yin //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-22: gdul dka' tshul 'chos g-yo sgyu can //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-23: rmongs dang sems khros g-yo can dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-24: dad med rtog ge pa lhan cig /
K12D0445_H0417:19a-25: rtags kyis nye bar 'tsho ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-26: nyan thos nor la brkam chags can //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-27: de kho na nyid sun 'byin cing //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-28: don dam pa ni mi shes pa //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-29: med par lta dang tshul khrims 'chal //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-30: gtam dang tshig ni kyal pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-31: 'dri ba la sogs mi bya zhing //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-32: se gol gtogs pa tsam du yang //
K12D0445_H0417:19a-33: de dang lhan cig gnas mi bya //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-0: las kyi phyag @19b rgya nyams dga' ba //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-1: gal te byis pa'i skye bo dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-2: de dang lhan cig dam tshig ni //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-4: bskyed na dam tshig dbus zhugs dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-5: pad snod phyag rgya sogs brten dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-7: dam tshig la ni 'jug mi bya //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-8: snod dang cang te'u gri gug dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-9: glegs bam dang ni bgrang phreng dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-10: dam tshig med pa gzhan dag la //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-11: gang du'ang bstan par mi bya'o //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-12: dge slong sngom la gnas pa la //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-13: rnal 'byor spyod sogs bya ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-14: man ngag rnams ni bstan mi bya //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-15: ras ris la sogs mi bstan cing //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-16: gang gis dam tshig lhan cig tu //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-17: ji ltar spyod pa yang dag spyod //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-18: bla ma la yang smra min na //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-19: gzhan rnams la ni smos ci dgos //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-20: dbang po yul la spyod pa ni //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-21: gang nas de ni bsngams nas ni //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-22: stong nyid gnyis med sgyu ma la //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-23: sogs pas kun rdzob ltag spyad na //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-24: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur sogs //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-25: nyams su myong ba'i bde ba yis //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-26: bde ba chen po'i dran pa yis //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-27: dbang po rnams ni yul las ldog /
K12D0445_H0417:19b-28: bdag bstod gzhan la smod pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-29: ye shes snyems sogs nges spangs pa //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-30: blo ldan rdo rje dbang phyug gi /
K12D0445_H0417:19b-31: yang dag sdom pa bshad pa yin //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-32: de lta bu sogs dam tshig ni //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-33: rnal 'byor pa yis rtag bsrung bya //
K12D0445_H0417:19b-35: rnal 'byor ldan pa rdo rje can //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-1: phreng dang ni dbu rgyan dang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-2: rus pa'i rang bzhin phyag rgya dang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-3: glegs bam bsam gtan ras ris dang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-4: thod pa la sogs rnal 'byor ma //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-5: thams cad du ni dngos grub phyir //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-6: bla ma la yang sba bar bya //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-7: sngags ni tshig tu brjod mi bya //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-8: mchu 'gul bar yang mi mngon zhing //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-9: cung zad mgrin par brjod bya yis //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-10: sngags kyi rgyal po de ltar bzlas //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-11: gsang las dngos grub mtshungs pa med //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-12: gang phyir de ni sdom par bshad //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-13: snod min nor ni chen po dang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-14: ldan yang rgyud las skyon du gsungs //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-15: bla mas bla med dngos grub phyir //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-16: 'bad pa yis ni spang bar bya //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-17: bza' btung gos la sogs pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-18: nor ni chen po la chags shing //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-19: snod min slob ma man ngag mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:20a-20: rmad du byung ba smra ba gang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-23: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las /
K12D0445_H0417:20a-24: sdom pa'i tshig gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o ////
K12D0445_H0417:20a-25: de nas gzhan yang de nyid nyon //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-26: dam tshig don ni bla na med //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-27: bza' ba yi ni dam tshig gang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-28: de ni de yi don bshad bya //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-29: bza' ba ru ni bshad pa gang //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-30: de ni bdud rtsi lnga ru brjod //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-31: rlung gi de nyid sbyor ba yis //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-32: zhu nas ro gcig slar yang ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-33: rdo rje lam nas steng song ste //
K12D0445_H0417:20a-34: gcig tu gyur pa bza' ba'o //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-0: dam tshig lus dang @20b ngag yid kyis //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-1: de nyid gsum dang gang shar dang //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-2: 'khor lo bzhi po rnams la yang //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-3: bde ba nyams su myong ba gang //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-4: de dang ro gcig rnal 'byor pa //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-5: rtag tu spyod pa bza' ba'o //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-6: byang chub sems kyi de nyid mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:20b-7: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang thim //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-8: zhu ba rlung gi de nyid kyis //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-9: bza' ba bsam gtan bzang po'o //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-10: spyi bo thod pa'i slad nas ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-11: de tsam rnal 'byor pas rtag tu; ;de la snying rje btung ba ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-12: byang chub sems dpa' bde ba che //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-13: snod mchog gsang ba'i padmar blugs //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-14: rten ni bza' ba rab rtogs byed //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-15: sems kyis bdud rtsi 'thung byed ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-16: bdud rtsi lnga yi ro rdzas 'thung //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-17: de za ba ni rdo rje 'chang //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-18: glang po rta khyi ba lang mi //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-19: byang chub sems dang bcas pa'i khrag /
K12D0445_H0417:20b-20: bsres nas skad cig de la bza'//
K12D0445_H0417:20b-21: de ni bdud rtsi lnga zhes brjod //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-22: rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-23: stong pa nyid du gsal ba'i snod //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-24: rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'//
K12D0445_H0417:20b-25: stong nyid ye shes pha rol 'gro //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-26: dga' ba gsum pa'i bde ba ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-27: lhan skyes lhan cig snod du ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-28: rdo rje can gyis rtag tu bza'//
K12D0445_H0417:20b-29: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-30: rnam rtog rlung rnams thams cad ni //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-31: zhi ba'i de nyid snod bzang por //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-32: rlung gi de nyid shes pas bza'; ;rnam rtog med pa'i go 'phang gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-33: phyag rgya gsum dang yang dag sbyor //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-34: phyag rgya chen por bshad snod du //
K12D0445_H0417:20b-35: rnal 'byor de nyid shes pas bza'//
K12D0445_H0417:21a-2: rnam rtog dang ni kun rtog gis //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-3: sgom dang sgom min sogs 'khrul pa //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-4: srog chen po yi snod du ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-5: rnam rtog dra ba'i sa bon tshogs //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-6: phung po'i bud shing snod bzang por //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-7: ye shes chen po'i me yis min //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-8: sngags kyi de nyid rtogs pas bza'//
K12D0445_H0417:21a-9: bdud bzhi'i khro bo chen po yi //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-10: stobs kyi rig pas sgrub pa po //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-11: sgrub pos legs par mnyam bzhag nas //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-12: rtag tu rnal 'byor snod du bza'//
K12D0445_H0417:21a-13: rlung dang sngags dang rdzas rnams kyi //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-14: thig le gsum ste bla na med //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-15: mi shigs go 'phang snod du ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-17: stong nyid ye shes mtshungs med pa //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-18: snying rje'i snod kyis mchog tu ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-19: ye shes chen po'i mnyam bzhag nas //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-20: btung zhing rtag tu btung ba'o //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-21: phyag rgya'i dam tshig ces su bshad //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-22: rdo rje padma yang dag sbyor //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-23: de kho na nyid mchog skyes gang //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-24: de ni skal ldan snod la ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-26: bsgrub par bya ba'i de nyid mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:21a-27: nyon mongs dang bral lhan cig skyes //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-28: phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgrub bya //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-29: de lta bu sogs dam tshig sogs //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-30: gzhan ni gang du'ang ngas ma bshad //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-31: rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:21a-32: bla ma'i zhal las gsal bar rtogs //
K12D0445_H0417:21a-33: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud dpal rdo rje phreng ba mngon par rtogs pa las /
K12D0445_H0417:21a-34: dam tshig gi don gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o ////
K12D0445_H0417:21b-0: @21b da nas gzhan yang bshad kyi nyon //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-1: sgra tsam don ni bshad par bya //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-2: gang gis shes pa tsam gyis ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-4: chos kyi 'khor lo'i pad sbubs su //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-5: sgra tsam yang dag gnas pa ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-6: chags med snang ba med pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-7: gnyis su med cing dri ma med //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-8: dpe bral g-yo ba med pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-9: gzhi med bla gab med pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-10: lha yi dbang phyug ye shes mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:21b-11: 'byung dang rngub pa rnam par spangs //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-12: rnal 'byor rnams kyi lha dbang phyug //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-13: de lta bu ni rnyed par dka'//
K12D0445_H0417:21b-14: mchog tu zhi ba bde ba che //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-15: gzugs mchog 'chi ba med pa'i mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:21b-17: rgun chang ro yis myos pa ltar //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-18: mchog tu nang du song gyur nas //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-19: de bzhin rnam pa kun gyi gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-20: sngags kyi de nyid rig pa'i rten //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-21: rang gi nyams myong rtog pa'i gnas //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-22: de nas ston pa bla med pa //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-23: rdo rje sems dpas zhus pa ni //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-24: bcom ldan de nyid zhi ba mkhyen //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-25: sngags kyi de nyid rab dbye ba //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-26: gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-28: de nas rdo rje can gyis gsungs //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-29: sngags kyi de nyid bla na med //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-30: mchog dang rab mchog phra ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-31: ye shes chen po mchog chen po //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-32: snying po yi yang snying po mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:21b-33: yang dag bshad kyi mnyan bar gyis //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-34: rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa rnams //
K12D0445_H0417:21b-36: lte ba'i 'khor lo de nyid mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:22a-2: stong nyid chen po'i dbus su thim //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-3: bde ba chen po'i go 'phang gsal //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-4: gnyis med 'jigs bral zhi ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-5: snang ba med cing kun rdzob med; ;gnyis med ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-6: sngags kyi de nyid rab gsal ba //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-7: thog ma med cing zhi ba dang //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-8: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-9: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med pa; ;byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin ni //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-10: de tshe thog mar stong nyid sgom //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-11: snang ba med pa'i go 'phang zhi //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-12: rang bzhin med gnas nyams dga' ba //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-13: rnam rtog med la mchog tu rten //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-14: stong nyid ye shes mtshungs pa med //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-15: byang chub sems kyi rgyud dang ni //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-16: yi ge h'um las yang dag byung //
K12D0445_H0417:22a-17: rnal 'byor shes pa rmad byung che //

K12D0445_H0417:30a-1: na med; ;ji ltar gnas ba'i rlung rnams kyi //

K12D0445_H0417:30a-11: rlung gi mtshan nyid ji lta bu //

K12D0445_H0417:30a-17: sbyor ba gnyis ni dus yin te //
K12D0445_H0417:30a-18: dus de nyin zhag drug cu'o //

K12D0445_H0417:30a-33: tsam gsum la ni mig btsums te //

K12D0445_H0417:30b-0: bde ba 'char ba de @30b gsum tsam //

K12D0445_H0417:30b-17: srog ni gnas ni bla na med //

K12D0445_H0417:30b-23: srog ni thim dang 'char ba yi //

K12D0445_H0417:30b-37: de tshe rang gi gnas su thim //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-2: de las me ni skye bar 'gyur //

K12D0445_H0417:31a-4: de las sa ni yang dag skye //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-5: de dag rnams las phung por 'byung //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-6: de phyir skye mched rnams dang ni //

K12D0445_H0417:31a-9: ji ltar skye bo de yi gnas //

K12D0445_H0417:31a-14: skye mched rnams ni sdud par byed //

K12D0445_H0417:31a-16: rgyags pa bskyed pa za ba'i phyir //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-17: phung po rnams kyang sdud byed nyid //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-18: rim gyis lus chen sgra sgrog byed //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-19: de las rgyags pa'i cha ni 'byung //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-20: rgyags pa'i cha ni sdud par byed //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-21: 'byung ba rnams kyis bsdus nas kyang //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-22: go rim ji lta ba bzhin du //

K12D0445_H0417:31a-24: rgyags pa'i cha ni za bar byed //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-25: de nas kyang ni rlung ni sdud //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-26: khyab cing phra ba sgrib par byed //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-27: de las mi bzad btang bzung dang //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-28: rnam shes skad cig sgrib par byed //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-29: bsgribs nas de las rnam shes kyang //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-30: bem por song nas brgyal bar 'gyur //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-31: skye mched cha ni sgrib par byed; ;dag pa'i ye shes mchog gi mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:31a-32: de las thim par gyur pa'i srog /
K12D0445_H0417:31a-33: rnam shes dang ni mtshungs par ldan //
K12D0445_H0417:31a-34: de nyid mchog ni de ltar bshad //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-0: srog ni thim zhing 'char @31b pa dang //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-1: ji lta ba bzhin yongs su shes //

K12D0445_H0417:31b-3: rigs pa gzhan yang bshad par bya //

K12D0445_H0417:31b-5: 'chi ba med pa'i sgrub pa ni //

K12D0445_H0417:31b-14: rdo rje sems dpas phyag byas zhus //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-15: 'chi ba med gnyis rigs par ni //

K12D0445_H0417:31b-17: de nas bcom ldan rdo rjes gsungs //

K12D0445_H0417:31b-28: sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-29: yang dug rnal 'byor rjes dran bya //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-30: sna rtser dbugs ni rgyu bya zhing //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-31: kha ni gsal bar dgag par bya //
K12D0445_H0417:31b-32: rkan gyi gnas son zla ba ni //

K12D0445_H0417:32a-15: yo shi raktam bde ba ni //
K12D0445_H0417:32a-16: blugs nas rtag tu rdzas kyi mchog /
K12D0445_H0417:32a-17: bdud rtsi bdun pa'i ming can no //
K12D0445_H0417:32a-18: nyal kar yang ni de 'thungs na //

K12D0445_H0417:32a-20: sngags kyi rgyal po aom a'a:h'um//

K12D0445_H0417:33a-2: rtsa gsum gnas ni rim gyis 'char //
